name: Steam Survivor (WIP)
description:
This is a WIP game made entirely live on twitch. It is therefore still extremely early and will be so for a while. And everything is subject to change.  Since it is a live project it seems fitting to allow access to it as soon as possible, giving you the option to shape the project as it moves along.

Main Concepts for the project:

  • It's a survivor clone.
  • In a Steampunk universe
  • I´m planning on reusing this universe for future projects.

You can follow the project by joining me on twitch (DeepRaccoon - Twitch) or watching the Cut dev vods playlist on youtube (Survivor Dev VODS - YouTube)

Current Build:

  • Simple "Gun"
  • Level up and Gain Stat improvements
  • 2ish enemies (Same but with different stats)
  • Survive for as long as you can

Controls:

KEYBOARD:

-WASD or ARROWS, To move

-TAB, To show Stats

GAMEPAD:

-LEFT Stick, To move

-X (PS controller or A Xbox Controler), To show Stats

ALL ART IS PLACEHOLDER AND TAKEN FROM FREE ASSETS

FREE - Pixel Crawler VL.1 by Anokolisa (itch.io)

Mohawk Racer Robot - Free! by FoozleCC (itch.io)

Colorful Robot Action Pack by FoozleCC (itch.io)

Sci-fi Lab Cyborg Platformer - Pixel Art by FoozleCC (itch.io)

Gallet City by Adam Saltsman (itch.io)

Steampunk (inspired) Health Bars by mental.bloxx (itch.io)

Mechanical Steampunk Pack by Smashdragons (itch.io)
